Source code for vpipe.steps.dataprep.featurization.time_to_christmas_transformer

import datetime
from vpipe.steps.dataprep.featurization.time_to_transformer import TimeToTransformer
import logging


logger = logging.getLogger("Forecast")


[docs]class TimeToChristmasTransformer(TimeToTransformer):
    """
    For the christmas date a column is created with a countdown of 30 days untill chirstmas (starting with zero and growing untill 1 when the date is christmas) 

    .. code-block:: python

        {
            "id": "d12",
            "enabled": true,
            "step_name": "TimeToChristmas",
            "params": {}
        }
    """

    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        self.set_dates([datetime.datetime(2017,12,25,0,0,0,0),
                        datetime.datetime(2018, 12, 25, 0, 0, 0, 0),
                        datetime.datetime(2019, 12, 25, 0, 0, 0, 0),
                        datetime.datetime(2020, 12, 25, 0, 0, 0, 0),
                        datetime.datetime(2021,12,25,0,0,0,0),
                        datetime.datetime(2022,12,25,0,0,0,0),
                        datetime.datetime(2023,12,25,0,0,0,0),])
        self.set_feature_name('time_to_christmas')
